org.displaytag.export

Class XmlTotalsWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.displaytag.render.TableWriterTemplate
      • org.displaytag.render.TableWriterAdapter
        • org.displaytag.export.XmlTotalsWriter

  • public class XmlTotalsWriter
extends TableWriterAdapter
    Writes the table as an XML file, including any totals and grouping information. Used by the FOP export.
    Author:
    rapruitt Date: Mar 10, 2010 Time: 4:21:28 PM
    See Also:
    FopExportView
